title: Executive Order 5415-Extension of Trust Period on Allotments of Kickapoo Indians, Kansas
content: It is hereby ordered, under authority contained in the act of June 21, 1906 (34 Stat. 325-326), that the trust period on the allotments made to members of the Kickapoo Band of Indians in Kansas, which trust period expires during the calendar year 1930, be, and is hereby, extended for a period of ten years, with the exception of the following:
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5415-Extension of Trust Period on Allotments of Kickapoo Indians, Kansas Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/276875
